title: [基础|综合][HAYO]vEssentials —— V基础，全新的基础插件[1.12]
author: mangiare
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mangiare 于 2018-2-23 13:28 编辑 






0350f57da2451563089aab0096935e9cd80ac329.jpg (88.64 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2018-2-23 11:47 上传





vEssentials是啥?   Virtual Essentials(简称vEssentials)是Essentials Light的重置版本   一个超不错的全新基础插件
下次更新时间:    2018-3-31 就是3月底vEssentials可以用来干啥子?  ·可以用来传送  ·可以设置家  ·改变时间/天气  ·设置主城（重生点）  ·以及更多（Essentials能干的它都能干）
有啥显著的特点:  ·转换Essentials的用户数据   ·转换Essentials Light的用户数据   ·转换Essentials Light的config.yml的数据   ·拓展更多
Config.ymlvessentials:
#玩家第一次加入时的消息
  firstjoin:
#是否启用
    enabled: false
#信息
    message: '&8[&e+&8] &7%player% joined for the first time!'
  #gamemode:
   # keep_at_world_change: false
   # keep_at_reload: false
   # keep_at_leave: false
  #walkspeed:
   # enabled: false
    #world: world
    #speed: 0.2
  visualization:
    sound: false
    animations: false
  elevator:
    enabled: false
    distance: 40
    block_above: 'CARPET'
    block_below: 'REDSTONE_BLOCK'
  homes:
    staff: 10
    premium: 5
    user: 1复制代码
Message.yml

#所有颜色代码都是§
#————————————————————————————————————————
#|  来自垃圾SanFu的一句抱怨
#|  本来汉化完毕的
#|  结果发布帖子之后所有配置文件都清零
#|  无奈只好重新翻译
#|  Ya Ya Ya~
#————————————————————————————————————————
#|   汉化文件在下面
#|   小白服主可以复制粘贴
#|   搞得懂就是了
#——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
#PREFIX: §8[§6Essentials§8] §7
#HOME_SET: §a已设置家 §7%home% !
#HOME_DEL: §a已删除 §7%home% !
#HOME_TP: §a欢迎回家!
#SPAWN_SET: §a重生点已设置!
#GAMEMODE_CHANGE: §a您的游戏模式已更新
#GAMEMODE_CHANGE_OTHERS: §a您已更新 %player%'%s% 的游戏模式!
#FLY_CHANGE_ON: §a现在您可以飞了!
#FLY_CHANGE_OFF: §a现在您不能飞了!
#FLY_CHANGE_OTHERS: §a您已更新 %player%'%s% 的飞行模式!
#TELEPORT_SUCCESSFUL: §a您已经传送过了!
#TELEPORT_SUCCESSFUL_SENDER: §a传送成功!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_SEND: §a您发送了一个传送请求!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_ACCEPT: §a接受传送!
#TELEPORT_LAST_LOCATION: §a回到您的死亡位置!
#INVENTORY_CLEARED: §a背包已清空!
#TIME_CHANGED: §a时间已经改变!
#TIME_PRIVATE_CHANGED: §a您的个人游戏时间已经改变!
#WEATHER_CHANGED: §a天气已经改变!
#HEAD_CHANGED: §a您的头颅已改变!
#SKULL_RECIEVED: §a您获得了一个头颅!
#SKULL_SEND: §a您发送出去了一个头颅!
#HEALED: §a您已被治疗!
#HEALED_OTHER: §a您已治疗 %player%!
#FEED: §a您已恢复饱和度!
#FEED_OTHER: §a你恢复了 %player%的饱和度!
#NO_PERMISSION: §c您没有足够的权限来执行这个命令!
#HOME_MAX_REACHED: §c您只可以设置 %amount% 个家!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_DENIED: §a您拒绝了传送请求!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_DENIED_REQUESTOR: §c%player% 拒绝了您的传送请求!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_DENIED_TO_OWN: §c您无法向您自己传送!
#PLAYER_JOIN: §8[§e+§8] §7%player% 加入了游戏!
#PLAYER_QUIT: §8[§a-§8] §7%player% 离开了游戏!
#CONSOLE_BEPLAYER: §c您得先成为一位玩家!
#PLAYER_OFFLINE: §c玩家 §7%player% §c已下线!
#GAMEMODE_UNKNOWN_ARGS: §c未知游戏模式，请使用/gm list来获取帮助
#FLY_UNKNOWN_ARGS: §c未知参数！请使用 /fly ([NAME])!
#TELEPORT_LAST_LOCATION_UNKOWN: §c您没有死亡位置
#ENDERCHEST_UNKNOWN_ARGS: §c未知参数！请使用 /enderchest ([NAME])!
#INVSEE_UNKNOWN_ARGS: §c未知参数！请使用 /invsee ([NAME])!
#HOME_NOT_EXISTS: §c这个家是不存在的!
#HOME_USE: §c请使用 /home ([NAME])来回到一个家!
#HOME_SET_USE: §c请使用 /sethome ([NAME])来设置一个家!
#HOME_DEL_USE: §c请使用 /delhome ([HOME])来删除一个家!
#HOME_LIST_USE: §c请使用 /homes来查看家!
#HOME_LIST_NONE: §c您没有家!
#SPAWN_NOT_EXISTS: §8[§c错误§8] §c重生点未设置!
#SPAWN_USE: §c请使用 /spawn来回到重生点!
#SPAWN_SET_USE: §c请使用 /setspawn来设置重生点!
#TELEPORT_USE: §7请使用 /tp [NAME] ([TARGETNAME])来传送一个玩家至另一个玩家身边 或者使用 /tp ([NAME]) [X] [Y] [Z]一个玩家到指定的位置!
#TELEPORT_ALL_USE: §7请使用 /tpall来传送所有玩家到你身边!
#TELEPORT_HERE_USE: §7请使用 /tphere [NAME]来传送指定玩家到你身边!
#TELEPORT_INVALID_COORDINATES: §c您输入的坐标无效，请确定一个坐标而且世界也要存在
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_USE: §c请使用 /tpa [NAME]来传送至一个玩家身边!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_HERE_USE: §c请使用 /tpahere [NAME]来让一个玩家传送至你身边!
#INVENTORY_CLEAR_USAGE: §c请使用 /clearinventory ([NAME])来清空一个玩家的背包!
#INTEGER_INVALID: §c错误的数字!
#ARGS_MORE_NEEDED: §c需要更多的参数!
#HOME_LIST: '§a您的家:'
#GAMEMODE_ALL_ARGUMENTS: '§a所有游戏模式:'
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_TO_RECIEVER: §7%player% 想要传送至你身边!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_TO_REQUESTOR: §7%player% 想要您传送至他身边!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_ACCEPTING: §7您可以在60秒内接受请求!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_EXPIRED: §7您的传送请求已过期!
#TELEPORT_LAST_LOCATION_USAGE: 回到死亡位置请使用 /back!
#TELEPORT_REQUESTS_EMPTY: §c您没有传送请求!
#SKULL_NAME: §6§l%owner%'%s% 的头
#——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
PREFIX: §8[§6Essentials§8] §7
HOME_SET: §aHome §7%home% §asuccessfully set!
HOME_DEL: §aHome §7%home% §asuccessfully deleted!
HOME_TP: §aWelcome at home!
SPAWN_SET: §aSpawn successfully set!
GAMEMODE_CHANGE: §aYour gamemode has been updated!
GAMEMODE_CHANGE_OTHERS: §aYou updated %player%'%s% gamemode!
FLY_CHANGE_ON: §aNow you can fly!
FLY_CHANGE_OFF: §aNow you can't fly anymore!
FLY_CHANGE_OTHERS: §aYou updated %player%'%s% flymode!
TELEPORT_SUCCESSFUL: §aYou have been teleported!
TELEPORT_SUCCESSFUL_SENDER: §aThe teleportation was successful!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_SEND: §aYou send a teleportation request!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_ACCEPT: §aTeleportation request accepted!
TELEPORT_LAST_LOCATION: §aThis is your last known location!
INVENTORY_CLEARED: §aThe inventory has been cleared!
TIME_CHANGED: §aThe time has been changed!
TIME_PRIVATE_CHANGED: §aYour personal time has been changed!
WEATHER_CHANGED: §aThe weather has been changed!
HEAD_CHANGED: §aYour head has been changed!
SKULL_RECIEVED: §aYou got a Skull!
SKULL_SEND: §aYou send a Skull!
HEALED: §aYou got healed!
HEALED_OTHER: §aYou healed %player%!
FEED: §aYou have been fed!
FEED_OTHER: §aYou fed %player%!
NO_PERMISSION: §cYou are not allowed to use this command!
HOME_MAX_REACHED: §cYou are only allowed to set %amount% homes!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_DENIED: §aYou denied the teleportation request!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_DENIED_REQUESTOR: §c%player% denied your teleportation request!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_DENIED_TO_OWN: §cYou can't send a teleportation request to yourself!
PLAYER_JOIN: §8[§e+§8] §7%player% joined the game!
PLAYER_QUIT: §8[§a-§8] §7%player% quit the game!
#这个是后台使用玩家指令时发出的消息
#上面有汉化的
CONSOLE_BEPLAYER: §cYou have to be a player!
PLAYER_OFFLINE: §cPlayer §7%player% §cis offline!
GAMEMODE_UNKNOWN_ARGS: §cUnkown argument! Use /gm list to get a list of all types!
FLY_UNKNOWN_ARGS: §cUnkown argument! Use /fly ([NAME])!
TELEPORT_LAST_LOCATION_UNKOWN: §cNo known last location!
ENDERCHEST_UNKNOWN_ARGS: §cUnknown argument! Use /enderchest ([NAME])!
INVSEE_UNKNOWN_ARGS: §cUnknown argument! Use /invsee ([NAME])!
HOME_NOT_EXISTS: §cThis home does not exists!
HOME_USE: §cUse /home ([NAME])!
HOME_SET_USE: §cUse /sethome ([NAME])!
HOME_DEL_USE: §cUse /delhome ([HOME])!
HOME_LIST_USE: §cUse /homes!
HOME_LIST_NONE: §cYou do not have homes!
SPAWN_NOT_EXISTS: §8[§cERROR§8] §cSpawn not set!
SPAWN_USE: §cUse /spawn!
SPAWN_SET_USE: §cUse /setspawn!
TELEPORT_USE: §7Use /tp [NAME] ([TARGETNAME]) or /tp ([NAME]) [X] [Y] [Z]!
TELEPORT_ALL_USE: §7Use /tpall!
TELEPORT_HERE_USE: §7Use /tphere [NAME]!
TELEPORT_INVALID_COORDINATES: §cYour coordinates are invalid! Be shure all coordinates
  are numbers and within the worldborder!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_USE: §cUse /tpa [NAME]!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_HERE_USE: §cUse /tpahere [NAME]!
INVENTORY_CLEAR_USAGE: §cUse /clearinventory ([NAME])!
INTEGER_INVALID: §cInvalid number!
ARGS_MORE_NEEDED: §cMore arguments are needed!
HOME_LIST: '§aYour homes:'
GAMEMODE_ALL_ARGUMENTS: '§aAll known gamemode types:'
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_TO_RECIEVER: §7%player% wants to teleport to you!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_TO_REQUESTOR: §7%player% wants to teleport you to him/her!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_ACCEPTING: §7You can accept the request during the next 60 seconds!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_EXPIRED: §7Your teleport request is expired!
TELEPORT_LAST_LOCATION_USAGE: To teleport you to your last known location use /back!
TELEPORT_REQUESTS_EMPTY: §cYou don't have any teleportation requests!
SKULL_NAME: §6§l%owner%'%s% Head复制代码

replies.author: 寂
replies.txt_content:
请补全插件的权限和命令介绍。
另外 
#TELEPORT_USE: §7请使用 /tp [NAME] ([TARGETNAME])来传送一个玩家至另一个玩家身边   ([TARGETNAME])是可选的 可以直接使用/tp [NAME] 来传送。
#TELEPORT_LAST_LOCATION: §a回到您的死亡位置!
原文中写的是last known location 建议直接翻译成上一个位置

以上建议来自 @爱国民主  
感谢 @爱国民主 的反馈。
希望楼主能够修改使作品更加精彩，为MC联机界做出更大的贡献、加油。
